channel.title: CW abilities not working
channel.description:
#### What happened? When I would swap people, they wouldn't get swapped and when I barriered an Alchemist he got redirected
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Literally the opposite #### Steps to reproduce: Play cw #### Comments: Literally my abilities in my last game did not do a damn thing

item.title: CW abilities not working

item.description:
I shall become a sage in a cult game mark my words!

item.title: CW abilities not working

item.description:
What do you mean that was a bug? Everyone knows that the CW’s Ability’s are just for show. (Presumably so that Firekitten can become a Sage somehow. (Nevermind that it’s always cult))

item.title: CW abilities not working

item.description:
What happened?

When I would swap people, they wouldn’t get swapped and when I barriered an Alchemist he got redirected

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Literally the opposite

Steps to reproduce:

Play cw

Comments:

Literally my abilities in my last game did not do a damn thing
